name: Fly - 2021 "Freedom" Game Jam
description:
In Fly - You play as a bird trapped in a bird cage in this Puzzle Platformer! Reach the golden finish platform to open the door and escape!

Use:

A & D to Move

Spacebar to Jump

& F to Glide/Float

Game Created By:

AJ Kuras

Andrew Mallach

Anthony Griggs

Dylan Twomley

Matt McLaughlin

Micah Ahn
